text: is a Japanese professional baseball pitcher for the Tohoku Rakuten Golden Eagles of the Nippon Professional Baseball. He previously played for the Chiba Lotte Marines. On December 19, 2018, he was sent to Tohoku Rakuten Golden Eagles as the human compensation from the earlier transferred for Manabu Mima. On December 23, 2019, he held press conference. ==References== ==External links== *NBP Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Chiba Lotte Marines players Category:Japanese baseball players Category:Nippon Professional Baseball pitchers Category:Baseball people from Osaka Prefecture Category:Tohoku Rakuten Golden Eagles players
title: Tomohito Sakai
